name: Hadean Lands
description: Alchemy, puzzles, and a crashed starship. Old-style interactive fiction â€” a classic text adventure. No graphics! No dialogue trees! No point-and-click! You type your commands, and read what happens next.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 60 MB available space

reviews.review_text: A text adventure for real puzzle-lovers. This is a game that's all about mastering something huge and complex. Sophisticated automation of multi-step tasks helps you manage the complexity, but that just allows it to become even more complex. The alchemy here is a little reminiscent of the ritual magic in King's Quest III, but gives a stronger sense of being a system, with recipes that support substitutions.  I originally played the iOS version, but the Steam version has the same content, with a somewhat improved UI. (Finally I can keep the Alchemy Journal open in a separate window while typing in commands!)

This game is fantastic! One of the best parts of the game is the fact that you have to experiment with everything to figure out what to do next. It is truly enjoyable, especially for anyone who enjoys reading. Anytime I get confused, I just type random cuss words in, and enjoy seeing the words 'command not recognized'. Truly enjoyable! 10/10
